title: 'The size is very small'
body: 'This is a very small size bucket. pictures is misleading'

title: 'Bad Bad ! Waste'
body: 'Do not buy this. Entirly waste of money and time. Low quality and forget bathing this Cant even used for toilets.'

title: 'Damaged priduct'
body: The bucket was damaged and the courier person didn't return the balance money of Rs.350.  He cheated me by saying I will get the change and come back.

title: 'Thin Plastic'
body: 'The quality of plastic is not upto the mark of cello. Thin plastic build.'

title: 'Size is not according to given in the picture.'
body: 'The bucket material is good and it looks nice but only issue is the size. The height of the bucket is given as 24 inches but it is only 19 1/2 inches .'

title: Small size, have initiated return since the order delivered, it's not picked up yet
'Cute bucket'
body: 'Bought this to go about watering plants.. came dented here n there very slightly due to transit issues i suppose but serves my purpose so kept it'

title: 'Too costly'
body: 'Not worth for money and size is small'

title: 'Poor quality'
body: 'The quality considering the brand Cello is extremely poor..'

title: 'Material too soft'
body: 'The product is fine but the plastic material used is too soft! Bends easily and might crack soon is what i worry!'

title: Don't go for it
body: This is literally a big mug size.... Cheating the customers mentioning in the description as it is 5lit...please don't go for it

title: 'Bucket was small than my expectation'
body: 'Good quality bucket although had to return because I imagined something big but 5ltr bucket is this size only ðŸ˜„'

title: 'Good'
body: Material seems to contain Nylon. Thus it's not easily breakable. Serves the purpose. Only downside is that it was sent just in an Amazon brown paper bag without bubble wrap, due to which wherever the bucket was squeezed in transport, have got slight white stretch marks. If it was just plastic, it would have been broken on the way. Thanks to Nylon in it.

title: 'Extremely poor quality'
body: Please don't buy this bucket.  The plastic is extremely thin. I can guarantee that it will break within a couple of weeks.  It gets delivered with no packaging, other than the brown paper bag used by Amazon. The bucket I ordered was delivered with a dent. It's a pain to return the product.  I expected much better quality from a company like Cello. So disappointed.
